episodes.title: When a Cult Makes a Music Video: Scientology's "We Stand Tall"
episodes.description:
In this video I talk about the compelling music video made by Scientology in 1990 called "We Stand Tall". The video was essentially a propaganda piece extolling the virtues and riches of the Church of Scientology, but when it leaked into the wog world it was essentially laughed out of existence.

Dancing with Ghosts (Music Only) Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-_Fp5xMRz6v9aLahw-tYQw
